mita pera pawathi awasan tharangawaladi indiyawa, pakisthanaya ha engalanthaya yana kandayam jayagrahana athkara ganna ladi. 2007-2008 dakunu aprikawedi pawathi tharangawarayedi awasan tharangayen pakisthanu kandayama parajayata path karamin indiya kandayama jaya athkara gaththeya. 2009 tharangawaliya engalanthaye pawathi athara ehidi awasan maha tharangaya shri lankawata erehiwa jaya ganimata pakisthanu kandayama samathwiya.

raja widiya : 2013 api heta mareyida jiwath weyida kiyannawath api hariyata danne naha.mehema hithenakota api me monawada karanne kiyalath hithenawa.minissu hama deyakma karanne jiwath wenna misak marenna uwamanawen neweyi kiyana eka amuthuwen kiyanna deyak neweyine.minissu horu wenne minimaruwo wenne me pawathina samaja thathwe nisa kiyala unath kiyanna bari kamak naha.mona de hari karala minissu balanne salli hoyanna.ee yana gamanedi ekineka thora ganna paththa thamayi minissunge jiwanalokaya wenne.samaharawita ee de pudgalayekuge jiwath wime kalayath thiranaya karanna puluwan.thamanta hithena de , thamanta uwamana karanade thamanlaga nathiwenakota minissunta danena wedanawa duka ee de widawapu kenek arenna wena kenek danne nathuwa athi.dukayi wedanawayi deka wena wenama therum karannanam mata therumak naha.habayi mama dannawa ee deka dekak kiyala.dan hithanawada danne naha adath liyanna yanne mala ilaw premaya nohoth aadaraya gana kiyala.naha naha ada wenamama deyak liyanna yanne.(balagena yanakota premayatayi adarayatayi dekatama therum dekak thiyena patayi?)
